name: Knightly
description:
You're a little knight, running for your little life! Press the UP button to jump over enemies. If you die, press RETURN/ENTER to start again. Over time, the enemies will speed up, so be careful!

This game's music and art are from the incredible generosity of Tallbeard Studios, CleanCutGames, and  edermunizz. Their music and art are part of the Bundle for Racial Justice and Equality. Please consider purchasing it, and donating your money towards a better future.
